document_data.name: Ilistar Dynasty
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ilistar Dynasty''' ruled over the city-state of [[Westgate]] from the {{YearlinkName|616}}, until the {{YearlinkName|927}}. The Ilistar Dynasty began when the [[androsphinx]] King [[Lyonarth]] and the [[lamia noble]] [[Nessmara]] killed each other, and [[Farnath Ilistar I|Farnath Ilistar]] was chosen to be the next king of Westgate.
document_data.Monarchs:
; King Farnath I 
: Reigned {{Yearlink|616}} – {{Yearlink|663}}. [[Wizard]] who was chosen to be the next King of Westgate after [[Lyonarth]].
; King [[Belhendar Ilistar|Belhendar "the Stout"]] 
: Reigned {{Yearlink|663}} – {{Yearlink|687}}. Firstborn son of Farnath I.
; King [[Thartryn Ilistar I|Thartryn I]] 
: Reigned {{Yearlink|687}} – {{Yearlink|710}}. Second son of Belhendar. He was slain by [[Iyachtu Xvim]], who then took the throne.
; King [[Farnath Ilistar II|Farnath II]]
: Reigned {{Yearlink|734}} – {{Yearlink|756}}. Great-great-grandson of Farnath I. He drove the [[cambion]] king out of Westgate and reclaimed his family's throne.
; Prince [[Farnath Ilistar III|Farnath III]]
: Simpleton and heir of Farnath II. Banished from the city.
; King [[Temprith Ilistar|Temprith]]
: Reigned {{Yearlink|756}} – {{Yearlink|759}}. Younger brother of Farnath II.
; King [[Thartryn Ilistar II|Thartryn II]]
: Reigned {{Yearlink|759}} – {{Yearlink|783}}. Son (twin) of Farnath III.
; King [[Farnath Ilistar IV|Farnath IV]]
: Reigned {{Yearlink|783}} – {{Yearlink|834}}. Son (twin) of Farnath III.
; King [[Pendernath Ilistar|Pendernath]]
: Reigned {{Yearlink|834}} – {{Yearlink|849}}. Second son of Farnath IV.
; King [[Halcoranth Ilistar|Halcoranth]]
: Reigned {{Yearlink|849}} – {{Yearlink|886}}. Nephew of Pendernath.
; King [[Thartryn Ilistar III|Thartryn III]]
: Reigned {{Yearlink|886}} – {{Yearlink|890}}. Firstborn son of Halcoranth.
